Censorship.no! - Get Involved! Ouinet | Community

Community

There are many ways to plug into the Ouinet community and the larger surrounding ecosystem!

Translations

Help translate the Ouinet documentation! We use Weblate to crowdsource translations.

Please contact the Ouinet team if you're interested in becoming a reviewer for translation(s) in your language(s).

Collaborations

The Ouinet team is curious and eager to build collaborative relationships with aligned groups and projects.

Email the team:
ouinet [at] equalit [dot [ie]

Join our shared Matrix channel, Decentralized Wen Browsers

Source Code

Ouinet is entirely free and open source software, and can be integrated as a library dependency by pulling from Maven Central:


Ouinet is a project by eQualit.ie – a not-for-profit Canadian company developing open and reusable systems with a focus on privacy, online security and freedom of association. Technology solutions and innovations are driven by our values that guide us to protect the rights and aspirations of everyone online.
